title: What's The Craziest Thing You Said to Your Mom?
itunes:title: What's The Craziest Thing You Said to Your Mom?
description:
Today on the show we had Love and Hip Hop star Tommie Lee stop by, after months of being locked up, and today she told her story of what really happened with the case with her daughter at school. Moreover, her interview led to the discussion behind the scenes about whats the craziest thing they said to their mom listeners said to their mom so we wanted to know what our listeners thought about it. Also Charlamagne gave our celebrity and chief a way over due hee- haw for his racist comments on progressive congress woman of color. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
